Articles.Content:
I am fairly new to the game and need some guidance on... well many things actually but, its obvious the without a good spacecraft i'm not going to get far.

With this being said can anyone guide me in the direction of a video or tutorial that can help me understand simple rocket engineering and the physics around it?

Some maths involved. The rocket equation's easy enough to do as long as you have a scientific calculator (and if you're on a computer you have one built in, Natural logarithm shortcut key on windows calculator is n )

Edited May 22, 2018 by Reactordrone
Check out Scott Manley on youtube. He has posted many Kerbal training videos.
